Macros

#define TMR_MODE_SETCLKSRC(x)
 Specifies the timer clock source as part of the mode.
 
#define TMR_MODE_SETCOUNTER(x)
 Is used to specify the timer counter mode when opening a timer port. More...
 
#define I_TMR_GETATTR
 This request gets the timer attributes. More...
 
#define I_TMR_SETATTR
 This request sets the timer attributes.
 
#define I_TMR_SETACTION
 This request sets the timer interrupt action.
 
#define I_TMR_ON
 This request turns the timer on. After a timer is opened it must be turned on before it starts running. The ctl argument is NULL.
 
#define I_TMR_OFF
 This request turns the timer off. After a timer is opened it is off.
